thread.title: Kevin McDonald delighted at Scotland call-up
thread.title_full: Kevin McDonald delighted at Scotland call-up

title: Kevin McDonald delighted at Scotland call-up
text:
Tweet 
The 26-year-old, who signed a new three-year deal at Molineux last week, is uncapped at senior level but was included in Graham Strachan’s squad for the game with Germany a year ago. 
Scotland are currently fourth in Group D and need to take at least four points from the two games and hope other results go their way in order to qualify for next summer’s tournament. 
"I was obviously delighted with the call-up," said the midfielder. 
"It’s a great feeling and I’m buzzing. 
"I didn’t expect it as I’ve only just got back into the team. 
"But I am over the moon with it. 
"It is a great chance to show what I can do and hopefully I can get some game time. 
"It would mean everything to get a cap – representing your country is something any player wants to do. More on this story:
